title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Heat olive oil in a pan and cook the pancetta until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and Parmesan cheese.
Drain the pasta and combine immediately with the pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve warm.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until slightly charred.
In a pan, saut√© onions in butter until golden.
Add tomato puree and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add grilled chicken and cook for an additional 10 minutes.
Stir in heavy cream, season with salt and pepper, and serve warm.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Fresh avocado on toasted bread, topped with salt, pepper, and optional chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and mix with lemon juice.
Spread the avocado mixture evenly on the toasted bread.
Season with salt, pepper, and optional chili flakes.
